about_the_game:
WARNING: THIS IS THE SECOND PART OF A TWO PARTS VISUAL NOVEL, IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THE FIRST PART BEFORE TO FULLY UNDERSTAND THE STORY

After five extraordinary and incredible days in New York, full of blood, betrayals, persecutions, satanic pacts and fortune; a submissive and despised man, George Adams, has discovered a world in which he has demonstrated to the dark forces, that there is strength and thirst for revenge inside him. He has consummated an alliance that has made him a powerful vassal of the satanic hordes and now he returns to his village, a community near Atlanta, where he will unleash the fury of the underworld.
Gone is the city that never sleeps, plunged into chaos and defenseless, before the great battle that will occur between the forces that govern the universe, but only the strongest will prevail...

Welcome to be part of an unsuspected adventure that is only possible in a world where thoughts have the force of a decision and everything happens in view of who is able to see…

Because

"The mysteries will remain mysteries until it's your turn to look by yourself...”
- German L Ramos

Welcome to The Necklace of Blood... Part 2

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violent scenes and topics related to occultism

detailed_description:
WARNING: THIS IS THE SECOND PART OF A TWO PARTS VISUAL NOVEL, IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY THE FIRST PART BEFORE TO FULLY UNDERSTAND THE STORY

After five extraordinary and incredible days in New York, full of blood, betrayals, persecutions, satanic pacts and fortune; a submissive and despised man, George Adams, has discovered a world in which he has demonstrated to the dark forces, that there is strength and thirst for revenge inside him. He has consummated an alliance that has made him a powerful vassal of the satanic hordes and now he returns to his village, a community near Atlanta, where he will unleash the fury of the underworld.
Gone is the city that never sleeps, plunged into chaos and defenseless, before the great battle that will occur between the forces that govern the universe, but only the strongest will prevail...

Welcome to be part of an unsuspected adventure that is only possible in a world where thoughts have the force of a decision and everything happens in view of who is able to see…

Because

"The mysteries will remain mysteries until it's your turn to look by yourself...”

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4

  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: The Necklace of Blood Part II is the second part of a two parts thriller visual novel. It continues immediatly after the first part finished
